history.content:
Are you (or friend) looking for a workstudy job?  Apply to be an EECS Student Assistant (job id# 3628199944)!

We're looking for two student employees who can commit to working 10 hours/week. The hourly rate is $15.00/hour.We are looking for folks to start ASAP and continue through May.  Please see below for details: 
HOW TO APPLY Please submit the following to Cindy Conners at csconners@eecs.berkley.edu:  
  • Your resume, with previous office work experience highlighted (if applicable) 
  • Your availability. Please indicate the hours (two-hour minimum time-block) you are regularly available to work between the hours of 8am-5pm, Monday-Friday
JOB DESCRIPTION:
Upon close supervision, the student assistant will assist with administrative tasks such as room reservations, office organization, updating websites and databases, etc. The assistant will also help out with department events and special projects as needed like CS Ed Day, Cal Day, Commencement, Student Awards, etc. 
QUALIFICATIONS: 
  • Demonstrated reliability and previous experience working in an office environment strongly preferred
  • Ability to interact appropriately with diverse individuals in a student affairs office
  • Detail-oriented with the ability to accomplish work efficiently and with a high degree of accuracy
  • Demonstrated ability to work both independently and in a team-based environment
  • Ability to maintain confidentiality
  • Experience with Adobe Suite and Microsoft Office Suite
  • Interest in or experience with event planning strongly preferred
  • Available to work from 10 hours a week during the semester. Availability over school breaks and minimal weekend availability is desired.
history.subject: EECS is hiring Work Study positions
